title: Bali Island Paradise

itinerary.title: Ubud Arrival
itinerary.description: Check into Ubud resort surrounded by rice terraces.

itinerary.title: Temples & Culture
itinerary.description: Visit Tanah Lot and Uluwatu temples.

itinerary.title: Beach Time
itinerary.description: Relax on Seminyak or Canggu beaches.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final day at leisure before departure.

description: Discover the beauty of Bali with its temples, beaches, and rich culture.
